name: Tap Tap Play
description:
With exciting music, catchy gameplay, Tap Tap Play is a simple super fun game where you have limited time to tap as many as possible on the buttons while avoiding the empty area.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap on the buttons until it disappears
- After 10 consecutive taps (without tapping on outside buttons) a new button appears.
- There can be maximum 8 buttons. When you got 8, you enter Hot mode with high pitch background music and stunning visual effect.
- If you are having more than 1 button and tap on outside, you will lose 1 button.
- With each tap on buttons, your score will be added an amount equal to the number of buttons you're having.
- Game is over when time is out.

FEATURES:
- Simple but exciting gameplay
- Arcade music, old school feeling
- 8 bit (pixel) art
- Hot mode when you reach ultimate level: higher pitch music, stunning visual effect
- Share your High score and Last score to social network
- 2 leaderboards for Best Score and Most Recent Score
- In-app purchase to remove ads

Thanks for stopping by. Hope you'll enjoy the game!
